pr_title: Added config node  GTOWN_SETTINGS_OUTLAW_TELEPORT_WORLD - sets world …

timeline.message:
Added config node  GTOWN_SETTINGS_OUTLAW_TELEPORT_WORLD - sets world where outlaws will be teleported if the other options fail.
Check if players have townyadmin perms before teleporting them away from a town they are admin in.
Optionally teleport outlaws to the global_town_settings.outlaw_teleport_world spawn rather than the world the town is in.

Signed-off-by: Momshroom <Momshroom@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: I would move the isAdmin() test up to be in front of line 788. If this is an admin we need to bail out earlier.
timeline.author: LlmDl

replies.bodyText: I had it here intentionally so that admins/others with the perm to bypass (which I just added) will still be warned that they are outlawed in case they are also players, but... we likely don't want admins announce if the server is announcing outlaws, so I'm adding the generic admin check on line 791 as well.
replies.author: Momshroom

timeline.author: LlmDl

replies.bodyText: fixing... not even sure how that happened.
replies.author: Momshroom

timeline.message:
Added new permission node: towny.outlaw.tpbypass as a child of towny.admin
Changed the onOutlawEnterTown method to check for this  perm rather than just the generic townyadmin perm so that mods could be given just this perm.

Signed-off-by: Momshroom <Momshroom@gmail.com>

Adding a generic townyadmin perm check in line 791 so admins are not announced on servers that announce outlaws in towns.
Fixed whitespace addition as requested.

Signed-off-by: Momshroom <Momshroom@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Replace this with TOWNY_ADMIN_OUTLAW_TELEPORT_BYPASS("towny.admin.outlaw.teleportbypass"), added to line 10, below the admin nation zone node.
timeline.author: LlmDl

replies.bodyText: Done, but with teleport_bypass to be consistent with nation_zone.
replies.author: Momshroom

timeline.bodyText:
This isTownyAdmin() test should happen earlier, before the outlaw variable is declared.
Add a //comment mentioning that this is to keep towns from knowing an admin might be spying on them.
timeline.author: LlmDl

timeline.message:
Making requested changes:
Changed permission node name to towny.admin.teleport_bypass,
Changed checked node to TOWNY_ADMIN_OUTLAW_TELEPORT_BYPASS
Added requested comment in TownyPlayerListener and changed to use new node name.

Signed-off-by: Momshroom <Momshroom@gmail.com>

Making requested change:
Fixed comment referencing the old permission node.
Also, fixed permission node name in non-child node section of plugin.yml

Signed-off-by: Momshroom <Momshroom@gmail.com>
